mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ABROAD_SCRAP(USER_NUM, ABROAD_SCRAP_URL, ABROAD_SCRAP_TITLE, ABROAD_SCRAP_DESCRIPTION, ABROAD_SCRAP_PUBDATE, ABROAD_SCRAP_IMG_URL, ABROAD_SCRAP_WRITER) VALUES (#{user_num},#{link},#{title},#{description},#{date},#{imgSrc},#{author});

INSERT INTO DOMESTIC_SCRAP(USER_NUM, DOMESTIC_SCRAP_URL, DOMESTIC_SCRAP_TITLE, DOMESTIC_SCRAP_DESCRIPTION, DOMESTIC_SCRAP_PUBDATE, DOMESTIC_SCRAP_KEYWORD) VALUES(#{user_num},#{link},#{title},#{description},#{pubDate},#{keyword});
